generated_body: In the article titled "Trump puts economic growth at center of his 2020 campaign," the user can expect a discussion on how former President Donald Trump plans to prioritize economic issues as he campaigns for the 2020 election. The piece is likely to outline his proposed policies and initiatives aimed at stimulating growth, along with any strategic messaging that resonates with his voter base. Additionally, the article may delve into the political ramifications of this focus, including responses from his opponents and the potential impact on key demographics.
